name: Starting Equipment
contents:
At level 1, you gain the following equipment:
* A melee weapon (or weapons) appropriate to your class
* Armor appropriate for your class
* A ranged weapon with which you are proficient (non-spellcasters)


==Starting Wealth at Higher Levels==
If you start at a level other than 1, consult the following table for your starting wealth:

Level | Wealth
------|-------
2     | 3,000
3     | 5,500
4     | 8,000
5     | 11,000
6     | 14,000
7     | 19,000
8     | 26,000
9     | 34,000
10    | 45,000
11    | 60,000
12    | 80,000
13    | 105,000
14    | 140,000
15    | 190,000
16    | 250,000
17    | 330,000
18    | 440,000
19    | 590,000
20    | 760,000


Conversion rates:
- 1 CR = $1 USD 2022
- 1 CR = 1 cp
- 100 CR = 1 sp
- 1,000 CR = 1 gp

Note:
- cp, sp, and gp are for system 8
- they convert 1:1 for mundane purchases (food, livestock, vehicles, etc)
- magic items generally convert 1000:1, so a 3.5 item costing 35,000 gp actually costs 35,000 cp or 3.5 gp
